Articles.Content: So, I made a jet plane, that has 4 solid fuel boosters on the side for helping it takeoff. But, when I fly everything  looks good but no fire comes out of the engine?

pictures would help us to understand more.....

do you mean no fire from the boosters or the planes engine?

if you mean the planes engine try right clicking it and click the toggle mode button if there is one. I think it toggles between wet and dry mode.

I rarely use planes or air breathing engines so forgive me if I am wrong.

Edited August 24, 2018 by maceemiller
